entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
